title: Mobile Microlearning Design Utilizing Collaborative Learning Flow Patterns

context.prior_knowledge: Experience with fundamental digital collaboration tools and intermediate expertise in social sciences
context.additional_context: Social sector job enhancement course conducted on mobile devices in BYOD environments. Requires customized collaborative learning activities for working professionals

learning_goals: Learners can design three or more collaborative editing activities by applying the Collaborative Learning Flow Pattern (CLFP).
Learners can complete at least one digital collaboration scenario reflecting temporal and mandatory constraints.
Learners can operate process-driven electronic discussion activities in groups of three in mobile environments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
